pullrequest.title: Update the gtest fork to fix c++17 bugs

content.raw:
the newer gtest uses a variadic macro for `INSTANTIATE_TEST_CASE`, which causes a compiler warning for us, since we weren't using any variadic arguments. the solution in `ign-physics` is to add a `,` and `// NOLINT` at the end of the line because cpplint doesn't like the comma

* https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-physics/src/8e8ea8900745aeee7145e33a6f5bb481b23344eb/dartsim/src/SimulationFeatures_TEST.cc#lines-245:246

sorry for the size of this PR
content.html:
the newer gtest uses a variadic macro for INSTANTIATE_TEST_CASE, which causes a compiler warning for us, since we weren't using any variadic arguments. the solution in ign-physics is to add a , and // NOLINT at the end of the line because cpplint doesn't like the comma

  • https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-physics/src/8e8ea8900745aeee7145e33a6f5bb481b23344eb/dartsim/src/SimulationFeatures_TEST.cc#lines-245:246
